entry.title: Facebook Cookbooks
entry.content:
Join Phil Dibowitz (@thephild) for a discussion of how Facebook uses Chef and to learn more about the Cookbooks they have published to GitHub and the Supermarket.

  • Will Facebook's cookbooks work for me?

Post-show updates

  • Facebook is now continuously deploying their cookbooks to the Supermarket. Any build that passes all the tests gets automatically shared on the Supermarket.
